tool_description: Searches historical text corpora for word attestations across time periods to establish usage patterns and chronological development.

search_terms.description: Words or phrases to search for in historical texts

language.description: Language of the texts to search

text_types.description: Types of texts to include (literary, legal, religious, etc.)

max_results.description: Maximum number of attestations to return

context_window.description: Number of words of context around each attestation

error_messages: No results found: Search terms not found in available historical corpora for specified parameters.
Invalid date range: start_year must be earlier than end_year.
Language corpus unavailable: No historical corpus available for the specified language.
Search terms too restrictive: Try broader search terms or expanded date range.
Invalid text type: One or more specified text types are not available in the corpus.
Context window too large: Reduce context_window parameter to reasonable size (1-50).
usage: Provide search terms and language, optionally specify time period and text types. Returns historical attestations with chronological information for etymological dating.

attestation_dates.description: Dates or time periods for each attestation

earliest_attestation.description: Date and context of earliest found attestation
